I'm not talking about it quit much. But next to sports two of my other interests are data and finance. Based on those three interest I wanted to share the success story of Almere City which combines these three things beautifully

Instead of just focusing on football, they decided to be more than that. They wanted to be a fun place for their local community, like cinemas and theaters. This different approach made them really popular in their area.

In today's world, information is really important. Almere City FC realized they could use data to find good players and make better plans for games. Teun Jacobs, who manages the team's technical stuff, and John Bes, the director, thought of a new way to find players. Vantage AI came in with their knowledge of data and said they could help.

They worked together to use data to find good players. Instead of doing things like other teams, they wanted to find new ways to get better players. This wasn't just about using fancy technology; it was about using data to make smart choices.

Vantage AI looked at lots of data and used special math to help Almere City FC. They made a tool that could help the club decide which players to pick. This tool wasn't just for looking at players' skills; it also looked at small details that other teams might miss.

And it worked! Almere City FC got some really good players because of this. With Vantage AI's help, they knew which players to get and how to make the team better.

But it wasn't just about getting good players. This partnership showed how new ideas and working together can help a team succeed. It wasn't just about using data; it was about using new ideas to grow and get better. It showed that Almere City FC is young, ambitious, and determined to do things differently.

So, what do you think about the role of new ideas and smart planning in making football clubs successful? Almere City FC's story isn't just about football. It's about how any business can grow with the right ideas and planning.
